[{"id":"JT-48016","entityId":"25-2037781","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48016"},{"name":"summary","value":"Broken layout on attampt to add Server on VCS Integrations page"},{"name":"description","value":"
STR:

  • Open Custom fields page (/admin/customFieldsConfiguration)
  • Click on [Agile Boards] link in the header
  • Click on browser's [Back] button


AR:

AR: There is popup with issues. But user should hover mouse and notice that checkbox appear instead of priority. So he can select it

1. new control uses by hub vs old YT control
hub uses toggle control vs checkbox on YT (guess we need uniform it)

2. Background for YT admin page vs hub (white vs gray)
I guess we should have same background for all admin pages

3. interligne for query arrist. I guess we need reduce it
compare old with new:

4. Font size becomes less for some text and links (12px vs 13px)

5. Strange color #FF008C for the star (and for link to issue, after clone)

7. interligne for some hub-admin pages was reduced (the readability become worse)
Compare old users vs new

8. Outline for tabs

{"id":"JT-47872","entityId":"25-2030367","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47872"},{"name":"summary","value":"Project logo is not updated on the overview and in projects list"},{"name":"description","value":"

build 42711

STR:

  1. Update project logo
  2. In the same tab go to overview of this project
  3. Then go to the projects list

AR:
On both pages there's old logo instead of new

After page refresh actual logo is shown

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1530552139221,"updated":1530552150088,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"has external deps","cssClass":"c20"}]}, {"id":"JT-47796","entityId":"25-2027572","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47796"},{"name":"summary","value":"Custom widgets don't work on new project overview"},{"name":"description","value":"
build 42571

STR:
1) Install some custom widgets (for example, Cats Widget)
2) Go to project overview page
3) Try to add new widget here

AR:
There're only defalut widgets in dropdown, no new (custom) widgets

4) Go to Dashboard and add new widgets here
5) Return to project overview and Copy widgets from dashboard

AR:
Widgets are shown with error:

  1. Start YT on db with some custom widgets on project overview
